job.title: Software Engineer Applications
job.description: linkedin was built to help professionals achieve more in their careers and everyday millions of people use our products to make connections discover opportunities and gain insights our global reach means we get to make a direct impact on the worlds workforce in ways no other company can we are much more than a digital resume we transform lives through innovative products and technologyltbrgtltbrgtcreating economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce is a responsibility we all share to truly transform the global economy we must evolve the way we hire and enable our talent to serve people of all backgrounds and experiences linkedin is committed to diversity in its workforce and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer ltbrgtltbrgtlinkedin marketing solutions lms is in hypergrowth mode and has been rapidly gaining market share it has been growing at annual growth rate on a ampgtb business targeting and attribution are two key components of this accelerated business the teams mission is to build an industry leading audience targeting and attribution platform that helps businesses reach the right professional audience and demonstrate the full value of linkedin media by helping businesses assess and optimize the return on investment roi of their marketing efforts on these high quality audiencesltbrgtltbrgtas part of our worldclass software engineering team you will be in charge of building the cutting edge platform and applications that leverage online offline and nearline technologies in combinations with artificial intelligence techniques to drive value for our customersltbrgtyou will have the opportunity to work with multiple business partners from product marketing and central infrastructure teams to define plan and execute on initiatives that directly impact advertising revenue and ensure endtoend correctness of the data pipelinesltbrgtltbrgtresponsibilitiesltbrgtyou willltbrgtwork crossfunctionally with multiple teams including product managers fellow developers and infrastructure teams to build applications backend middletier business logic and leverage scalable storage systemsltbrgtbuild reliable highperformance and scalable missioncritical apis and backend servicesltbrgtwork on system scalability and performance improvementsltbrgtltbrgtbasic qualificationsltbrgtbs in computer science or related technical field or equivalent technical experienceltbrgt years of industry experienceltbrgtltbrgtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtbs with years of relevant work experience ms with years of relevant work experienceltbrgtexperience with object oriented design coding testing patterns and programming languages java c c or any backend language ltbrgtms or phd in computer science or related technical disciplineltbrgtltbrgtyou will benefit from our cultureltbrgtwe strongly believe in the wellbeing of our employees and their families that is why we offer generous health and wellness programs and time away for employees of all levelsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtequal opportunity statementltbrgtlinkedin is committed to diversity in its workforce and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer linkedin considers qualified applicants without regard to race color religion creed gender national origin age disability veteran status marital status pregnancy sex gender expression or identity sexual orientation citizenship or any other legally protected class linkedin is an affirmative action and equal opportunity employer as described in our equal opportunity statement here httpslnkdinequalemploymentopportunity please reference httpwwweeocgovemployersuploadeeocselfprintposterpdf and httpswwwdolgovofccpregscomplianceposterspdfofccpeeosupplementfinaljrfqacpdf for more informationltbrgtltbrgtlinkedin is committed to offering an inclusive and accessible experience for all job seekers including individuals with disabilities our goal is to foster an inclusive and accessible workplace where everyone has the opportunity to be successful ltbrgt ltbrgtif you need a reasonable accommodation to search for a job opening apply for a position or participate in the interview process connect with us at accommodationslinkedincom and describe the specific accommodation requested for a disabilityrelated limitation ltbrgt ltbrgtreasonable accommodations are modifications or adjustments to the application or hiring process that would enable you to fully participate in that process examples of reasonable accommodations include but are not limited to ltbrgt ltbrgtdocuments in alternate formats or read aloud to you ltbrgthaving interviews in an accessible locationltbrgtbeing accompanied by a service dogltbrgthaving a sign language interpreter present for the interviewltbrgt ltbrgta request for an accommodation will be responded to within three business days however nondisability related requests such as following up on an application will not receive a responseltbrgtltbrgtlinkedin will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about discussed or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant however employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information unless the disclosure is a in response to a formal complaint or charge b in furtherance of an investigation proceeding hearing or action including an investigation conducted by linkedin or c consistent with linkedins legal duty to furnish informationltbrgtltbrgtpay transparency policy statementltbrgtas a federal contractor linkedin follows the pay transparency and nondiscrimination provisions described at this link httpslnkdinpaytransparencyltbrgtltbrgtglobal data privacy notice for job candidatesltbrgtthis document provides transparency around the way in which linkedin handles personal data of employees and job applicants httpslnkdinglobaldataprivacynotice
